## Account class

An abstraction representing an account (user or Smart Contract) on the Network.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Account 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(address)](./sdk-core.account._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an account object from an address |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [address](./sdk-core.account.address.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IAddress](./sdk-core.iaddress.md) | The address of the account. |
|  [balance](./sdk-core.account.balance.md) |  | [IAccountBalance](./sdk-core.iaccountbalance.md) | The balance of the account. |
|  [nonce](./sdk-core.account.nonce.md) |  | [INonce](./sdk-core.inonce.md) | The nonce of the account (the account sequence number). |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getNonceThenIncrement()](./sdk-core.account.getnoncethenincrement.md) |  | Gets then increments (locally) the nonce (the account sequence number). |
|  [incrementNonce()](./sdk-core.account.incrementnonce.md) |  | Increments (locally) the nonce (the account sequence number). |
|  [toJSON()](./sdk-core.account.tojson.md) |  | Converts the account to a pretty, plain JavaScript object. |
|  [update(obj)](./sdk-core.account.update.md) |  | Updates account properties (such as nonce, balance). |
